__e: It's reassuring to see you're aware of the future, but this is all a little... creepy.
I'm sure that it remained frozen in amber just the way you left it, and that was probably wicked reassuring that you could go and do and see, and things would just stay the same here.
But it's reassuring seeing you do this at your age.
Well, it's so comforting to know that you're not afraid.
It's good to have your reassuring presence back with us.
And it was very reassuring to know... that the outside world knew something about our position.
